versions.devNotes:
-after 5000ms (5 seconds) of being paused, notification will be dismissed
-grouping more notifications (finished and currently downloading)
-fixed delete video bug
-fixed favorites checkign being weird
-fixed peek and pop not working for favorites
-hopefully fixed episode watch list from being stupid

-added awesome animation called shared elements
-removed transition animation from episode activity
-fixed solitaire win animation not doing it correctly
-fixed show check service being all weird
-fixed little bug when favoriting a show and returning to the list and the star isn't starred
-added notification for when app is checking for updates
-made badge go away when in recent and not when clicking the recent on app home screen
-added a notification to show when show check finishes
-added checks if device is offline
-added next time for update checking
-update checkes will start either on the hour or on the half hour
-added setting to turn notifications on or off
-added a quick tile for update checks
-changed blackjack so that you can see all cards you and the dealer has
-added some wifi settings

-updated Fetch!
-added time of videos that have been played
-added swipe to cancel for view downloads
-added play/pause indicator to widget and able to play and pause download on widget
-added a clear notifications item to the side drawer
-changed minimum widget size to 2x2
-better notifications
-(in 7.51) made a little mistake with notifications

-added fade out for lock dialog
-fixed a bug for newcomers with shortcuts and no security
-added widget so you can see current downloads on your homescreen!

-added a new shortcut to get to the videos
-added double tap to play and pause video
-changed some video colors
-made video ui fade out
-added picture in picture mode
-added cartoon covers
-removed solitaire shortcut and changed it to view downloads
-added time save to video player (A.K.A. when you leave a video, your current position will be save for when you return)
-added seek time, how much you are going forward or backwards in video player
-lock button for video that will lock all controls until you press the button

-made deleting videos nicer
-added multi video delete
-made video thumbnails the same size
-modified some database interactivity
-fixed refresh adding bug in episodes
-added a refresh to the video viewer
-fixed notificatoin update bug not showing the list
-added a badge to view downloads option when something is done downloading
-adding shortcuts
-new video player. This one is MUCH better

-added delete from viewing the videos
-added new activity to deal with opening videos from notification
-modified delete dialog to work with files too
-fixed text on video player buttons
-made video viewer runtime text background black

-HUGE code clean up and change. Changed how some things worked together for easier access on my side
-added new option to manually check for show updates on home screen
-modified how update checking works and is now MUCH more efficient
-added video launcher!
-added built in video player (You can still use your own if you would like. It is an option)

-added three new items to the side bar (Favorite Count, App Version, Download Count)
-made peek and pop work on more than just one part. You can press and hold the text now to get it
-added past version notes
-added header to side bar so you guys know what FUN stands for and so you always know what version of the app you are on
-fixed a small bug with viewing some shows

-new peek and pop like action when wanting to preview a show
-ALL NOTIFICATIONS SHOULD WORK NOW! (I hope. Send feedback if one isn't working)
-added favorite count
-added side drawer
-added export and import finishing toast
-changed star to checkbox to decide which shows you want to be shown on the homescreen

-bug fixes
-added a cheat like mode to video poker
-added more high score stuff to solitaire
-added something new to download a video (It is an option that can be turned on and off in the settings)

-bug fixes
-added a dialog to schedule so we can actually see the entire description
-cleaning up schedule
-fixed checking episode when show is not favorited bug
-high score to solitaire (I dont care what you guys say. I play solitaire!)
-added a new delete dialog (let me know if you guys like it)
-made some things cleaner and smoother when going from activity to activity
-new fancy effects when going to a new activity

-bug fixes (I mean...We all saw this one coming)
-changed hearts to stars
-fixed some favoriting issues
-made a better schedule reader
-fixed app not downloading all parts to a movie

-fixed a weird scrolling issue in schedule
-added going back to home screen when going to show from a link
-made share better, able to choose more options
-made firebase notifications bigger so you guys can see more if there's an urgent message or if you want to see what was updated
-made it so that when you go to downloads from notification and press back, it'll take you to the home screen
-made it so that there is only one task (If you don't understand that's fine. Basically, bug fix)
-bug fixes (Duh)

-added a time for when anime came out. It is not working for when they will come out, only once they come out. (Source is Livechart.me)

-added sharing

-added customizable shows to display on the home screen
